title: RADS Error
body:
Whenever I open the LoL client after the splash appears I get a RADS Error 
"**_Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access_**".

I have tried a few solutions. Removing Firewall, Checking internet, Looking up old solutions such as messing with windows hosts file and changing DNS settings but to no avail.

I updated the client to the latest patch the day it came out and all was working well.

replies.body: The RADS error you're seeing is usually due to a setting with your OS that's preventing the game from launching.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!

You can watch [This Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iaPrTN3u0hc), it worked for me!
You can also try to run 'lol.launcher.admin' as administrator.
If this doesn't work, you can write "RADS Error fix for your OS" in Google.

_P.S.
I'm not creator of that video and I don't have any contracts with the creator!_
